attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a national bank holiday for all of England if not the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see St George celebrated as our patron Saint as the Irish do St Patrick.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make St Georges Day a national bank holiday for all of England if not the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22823


Prime Minister's Office
